attributes.action: Enable disabled access to the beach and sea (1 beach per coastal county)Scotland
attributes.background: I have 3 kids with 1 being disabled but cannot access my local beach to do simple things like throw stones in the water or just take all 3 into the sea without relying on another person being able to help me if I had flat access I cld take all 3 kids on my own and make more memories with them.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find your local council:

http://www.cosla.gov.uk/scottish-local-government
